info.title: GachaMachines-API
info.description: ### This is a Swagger UI for our GachaMachines API

/gachas.description: This is a Swagger UI for our Gachapon machines API

get.summary: Get a list of all Gacha machines
get.description: Returns a list of all Gachapon machines in API

requestBody.description: A new Gacha machine to be created.

200.description: Returns a list of Gacha machines

201.description: Adds a new gachapon machine to the database.

/gachas/{gachasId}.summary: Path used to manage single Gachas.
/gachas/{gachasId}.description: The REST endpoint/path used to get, update, and delete single instances of an `Gachas`.  This path contains `GET`, `PUT`, and `DELETE` operations used to perform the get, update, and delete tasks, respectively.

200.description: Successful response - returns a given Id `Gachas`.

get.description: Returs full details of a given Id Gachapon machine

/users.description: This is a Swagger UI for our Users API

get.summary: Get a list of all the users
get.description: Returns a list of all users in database

201.description: Adds a new User to the database.

/users/{userId}.summary: Path used to manage single Users.
/users/{userId}.description: The REST endpoint/path used to get, update, and delete single instances of an `User`.  This path contains `GET`, `PUT`, and `DELETE` operations used to perform the get, update, and delete tasks, respectively.

200.description: Successful response - returns a given Id `User`.

get.description: Returs full details of a given Id User

/items.summary: Path used to manage the list of items.
/items.description: The REST endpoint/path used to list and create zero or more `Item` entities.  This path contains a `GET` and `POST` operation to perform the list and create tasks, respectively.

get.summary: Get a list of all Items

200.description: Returns a list of all Items

201.description: Adds a new item to the database.

post.description: Creates a new instance of a `Item`.

/items/{itemId}.summary: Path used to manage a single Item.
/items/{itemId}.description: The REST endpoint/path used to get, update, and delete single instances of an `Item`.  This path contains `GET`, `PUT`, and `DELETE` operations used to perform the get, update, and delete tasks, respectively.

get.description: Gets the details of a single instance of a `Item`.

/ownerships.summary: Path used to manage the list of ownerships.
/ownerships.description: The REST endpoint/path used to list and create zero or more `Ownership` entities.  This path contains a `GET` and `POST` operation to perform the list and create tasks, respectively.

200.description: Successful response - returns an array of `Ownership` entities.

get.description: Gets a list of all `Ownership` entities.

201.description: Adds ownership details to the database.

post.description: Creates a new instance of a `Ownership`.

/ownerships/{ownershipId}.summary: Path used to manage a single Ownership.
/ownerships/{ownershipId}.description: The REST endpoint/path used to get, update, and delete single instances of an `Ownership`.  This path contains `GET`, `PUT`, and `DELETE` operations used to perform the get, update, and delete tasks, respectively.

get.description: Gets the details of a single instance of a `Ownership`.

/raritylists.summary: Path used to manage the list of raritylists.
/raritylists.description: The REST endpoint/path used to list and create zero or more `RarityList` entities.  This path contains a `GET` and `POST` operation to perform the list and create tasks, respectively.

200.description: Successful response - returns an array of `RarityList` entities.

get.description: Gets a list of all `RarityList` entities.

post.description: Creates a new instance of a `RarityList`.

/raritylists/{raritylistId}.summary: Path used to manage a single RarityList.
/raritylists/{raritylistId}.description: The REST endpoint/path used to get, update, and delete single instances of an `RarityList`.  This path contains `GET`, `PUT`, and `DELETE` operations used to perform the get, update, and delete tasks, respectively.

get.description: Gets the details of a single instance of a `RarityList`.

item1Rarity.description: Rarity randomizer slot 1 with its assosiated rarity collection of items.

item2Rarity.description: Rarity randomizer slot 2 with its assosiated rarity collection of items.

item3Rarity.description: Rarity randomizer slot 3 with its assosiated rarity collection of items.

item4Rarity.description: Rarity randomizer slot 4 with its assosiated rarity collection of items.

item5Rarity.description: Rarity randomizer slot 5 with its assosiated rarity collection of items.

item6Rarity.description: Rarity randomizer slot 6 with its assosiated rarity collection of items.

item7Rarity.description: Rarity randomizer slot 7 with its assosiated rarity collection of items.

item8Rarity.description: Rarity randomizer slot 8 with its assosiated rarity collection of items.

item9Rarity.description: Rarity randomizer slot 9 with its assosiated rarity collection of items.

item10Rarity.description: Rarity randomizer slot 10 with its assosiated rarity collection of items.

gachaAmount.description: Shows how many items are left in the Gachapon machine.

ItemImageLink.description: Link to the picture of the item

Ownership.description: Shows items user owns and it's ammount

Amount.description: Amount of items owned by user

RarityList.description: A list that contains all the items in a rarity list for a given machine
